pageContext.claim: “The Fake News Media is doing everything they can to crash the economy because they think that will be bad for me and my re-election. The problem they have is that the economy is way too strong and we will soon be winning big on Trade, and everyone knows that, including China!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump blames the news media for seemingly anything that could reflect poorly on him. Reporting on economic news and indicators, which at this point in time showed signs of a looming recession, is routine business that markets and voters rely on to be informed.
